summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.5°C) and outside temperature (down 4.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 728 m), and light levels (up 8357 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1675 m), and light levels (up 10207 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.1m lower than yesterday, 650.3m lower than the past week, 1675.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 996.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1646.5m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
